description.narrative: Through this project, MCC will address two bottlenecks that have led to high transportation and logistics costs for regional trade. The first will focus on connecting El Salvador's key trade hubs along the coastal corridor, including its airport and two seaports. The second investment will improve the infrastructure of a major border crossing with Honduras.
